subject: JUnit capacity testing extensions
msgSnippet: Hi, Are there any tools/JUnit extensions for running multiple instances of the same test in parallel (simultaneously)? Up to 30000 instances of a single JUnit
messageBody:
Hi,



Are there any tools/JUnit extensions for running multiple instances of
the same test in parallel (simultaneously)? Up to 30000 instances of a
single JUnit test should be run at the same time.



Or is the best way simply implementing a multithreaded JUnit test
manually?



Regards,

Dinko



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
